input.sentences: [male] finally realized his dream of visiting mayan ruins .
he got to go inside some of the crumbling structures .
[male] climbed all over the ancient facades .
the whole experience was wonderful for him .
output.sentences: on our vacation we visited the mayan ruins.
They are full of ancient carvings so detailed and interesting.
Unfortunatly all those structures are starting to crumble on the inside.
This young male though climbed on the facades and had a very good time.
I am glad he had this wonderful experience and was able to visit these sites.
